name: test_e2e_with_logs[086_XSS_BYPASS_007]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_BYPASS_007` |
| **Name** | SVG script href attribute |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | bypass |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `<svg><script href=data:,alert('XSS') />`
- **Encoded**: `%3Csvg%3E%3Cscript%20href%3Ddata%3A%2Calert('XSS')%20%2F%3E`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Latency**: ~32000ms
